fulltext:
Van Thieu Nguyen
vanthieunguyen234@gmail.com 0363091909
130 Dien Bien Phu Street, Ward 17, Binh
Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
PERSONAL PROFILE
A consistent, hard-working, highly motivated person. I enjoy working with the computer and the Internet,
including Microsoft Office, Internet searches, and troubleshooting computer software and hardware. I am looking
forward to participating as a team member in a dynamic work environment which providing an opportunity to
make a strong contribution by utilizing and expanding upon related education, skills, experiences and capabilities.
WORK EXPERIENCE
GAMELOFT
GAME EVOLUTION PROGRAMMER.
09/2018 - 05/2019
- Check and fix bugs in company's game (Dragon Mania Legend) using C++
and Java (basic).
- Implement new features in this game.
- Write batch file for project.
GAMELOFT
JAVASCRIPT PROGRAMMER.
05/2019 - NOW
- Design interface for tool on website using Javascript (Nodejs, Reactjs
and redux), HTML, CSS and framework Material UI.
- Programming game on Spark AR tool (effect on facebook and
instagram).
- Optimize, fix bug and implement new features in old projects.
FREELANCER
JAVASCRIPT PROGRAMMER.
2018 - NOW
- Design web with template sources using CSS, HTML, Javascript.
- Design and edit web wordpress using PHP, mySQL.
EDUCATION
HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF
TECHNOLOGY
DEPARTMENT OF CONTROL ENGINEERING & AUTOMATION AT
FACULTY OF ELECTRICAL – ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
2015 - 2019
GPA: 8.54/10.0
SKILLS
Programming
Self-study
Teamwork
English
INTERESTS
Research new things about website, such as: socket.io, MongoDB,
wordpress, bootstrap.
Challenge myself with a new programming language.
Played some brain-expanding game in free time.
Traveled somewhere nearby HCM city at the weekend.
